001package net.tvburger.jdl.perceptron;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.DefaultNeuralNetwork;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.InputNeuron;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.LastInputStoredNeuron;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.Neuron;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.model.scalars.activations.ActivationFunction;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.model.scalars.activations.Activations;
009
010import java.util.ArrayList;
011import java.util.List;
012import java.util.Random;
013
014public class Perceptron extends DefaultNeuralNetwork {
015
016    private static final Random random = new Random();
017
018    public static Perceptron create(int sensors, int responses) {
019        return create(sensors, 0, responses);
020    }
021
022    public static Perceptron create(int sensors, int associations, int responses) {
023        return create(sensors, associations, responses, Activations.step());
024    }
025
026    public static Perceptron create(int sensors, int associations, int responses, ActivationFunction activationFunction) {
027        List<List<? extends Neuron>> layers = new ArrayList<>();
028        List<Neuron> sensorNodes = new ArrayList<>();
029        for (int i = 0; i < sensors; i++) {
030            sensorNodes.add(new InputNeuron("Sensor(" + i + ")"));
031        }
032        layers.add(sensorNodes);
033
034        List<Neuron> associationNodes = new ArrayList<>();
035        for (int i = 0; i < associations; i++) {
036            associationNodes.add(new Neuron("Association(" + i + ")", randomSelect(sensorNodes), activationFunction));
037        }
038        layers.add(associationNodes);
039
040        List<Neuron> responseNodes = new ArrayList<>();
041        for (int i = 0; i < responses; i++) {
042            responseNodes.add(new LastInputStoredNeuron("Response(" + i + ")", associationNodes.isEmpty() ? sensorNodes : associationNodes, activationFunction));
043        }
044        layers.add(responseNodes);
045        return new Perceptron(layers);
046    }
047
048    private static List<Neuron> randomSelect(List<Neuron> sensorNodes) {
049        List<Neuron> selected = new ArrayList<>();
050        for (Neuron sensorNode : sensorNodes) {
051            if (random.nextBoolean()) {
052                selected.add(sensorNode);
053            }
054        }
055        return selected;
056    }
057
058    private Perceptron(List<List<? extends Neuron>> layers) {
059        super(layers);
060    }
061
062}
